headline: AI Helps Build Travel Industry Resilience: Salesforce's Xu
summary: Artificial intelligence is becoming a key tool for building resilience in the travel industry as the impact of the government shutdown weighs on the FAA and air traffic controllers. Nancy Xu, head of Agentforce at Salesforce discusses with Tim Stenovec on "Bloomberg Tech."

headline: Lessen Appoints Chris Lyman as Executive Vice President of Commercial Sales and Key Accounts
summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., November 10, 2025--Lessen, the leading platform powering end-to-end property services and technology solutions for real estate operators, today announced the appointment of Chris Lyman as Executive Vice President, Commercial Sales and Key Accounts. In this role, Lyman will lead the expansion of Lessen’s commercial business, drive customer growth across strategic and enterprise accounts, and further accelerate sales operation capabilities.

raw.headline: Lessen Appoints Chris Lyman as Executive Vice President of Commercial Sales and Key Accounts
raw.summary: SCOTTSDALE, Ariz., November 10, 2025--Lessen, the leading platform powering end-to-end property services and technology solutions for real estate operators, today announced the appointment of Chris Lyman as Executive Vice President, Commercial Sales and Key Accounts. In this role, Lyman will lead the expansion of Lessen’s commercial business, drive customer growth across strategic and enterprise accounts, and further accelerate sales operation capabilities.

headline: Wall Street Bulls Look Optimistic About Salesforce.com (CRM): Should You Buy?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Salesforce.com (CRM) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?

headline: 3 Mega-Cap Stocks That Concern Us
summary: "Too big to fail" is how we would describe the megacap stocks in this article today. While they will likely stand the test of time, it’s not all sunshine and rainbows as their scale can limit their ability to find new sources of growth.
